txt.en: 'We must hurry before they realize I have been freed.'
'I can make my way from here. Thank you, [placeholder].'
Anurandir was captured by half-orcs, and it is up to you to save him.

'I... I am the leader of the trackers of Echad Eregion... we have kept a close watch on the half-orcs of Barad Morlas. Through our vigilance we have marked the coming and going of their messengers, supplies... even intercepted orders.\n\n'I was captured, please, help me escape. I fear that soon they will be back to torture information from me.'

'Anurandir returned and spoke with me, I could hardly believe his tale! You are truly a [placeholder] of great skill.  Anurandir returned to his duties in the wild, but your rescue will not soon be forgotten.'
Return to Dornhador in Echad Eregion.\n\nInform Dornhador that you rescued Anurandir.
'Anurandir's rescue will not soon be forgotten!'
